curam.util.administration.impl

Interface ResourceAccessor


  • public interface ResourceAccessor
    A interface that will be implemented by a DynamicProduct_ResourceAccessor which reads/writes the DP meta-data and clears all the Cache during synchronization.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void read(curam.util.internal.resources.struct.ResourceKey key)
      Read the dynamic domain resources and place the details in the resource store.
      void write(curam.util.internal.resources.struct.ResourceDetails resourceDetails)
      Write the DP meta-data.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        void write(curam.util.internal.resources.struct.ResourceDetails resourceDetails)
        Write the DP meta-data. This can be treated as a "modify" operation, not a "create".
        Parameters:
        resourceDetails - Resource details which are to be written to the resource store.

      • read

        void read(curam.util.internal.resources.struct.ResourceKey key)
        Read the dynamic domain resources and place the details in the resource store.
        Parameters:
        key - The ResourceKey based on which, the resource is identified.
